Draw an arc (arc\\_2) with a start point at [0.33, 0.0], a mid point at [0.3618, 0.0132], and an end point at [0.375, 0.045]. 4. Draw a line (line\\_2) from [0.375, 0.045] to [0.375, 0.1425]. 5. Draw an arc (arc\\_3) with a start point at [0.375, 0.1425], a mid point at [0.3618, 0.1743], and an end point at [0.33, 0.1875]. 6. Draw a line (line\\_3) from [0.33, 0.1875] to [0.045, 0.1875]. 7. Draw an arc (arc\\_4) with a start point at [0.045, 0.1875], a mid point at [0.0132, 0.1743], and an end point at [0.0, 0.1425]. 8. Draw a line (line\\_4) from [0.0, 0.1425] to [0.0, 0.045]. Extrusion: Extrude the sketch along the Z-axis by 0.75 units, with a scale of 0.375. The resulting shape is a rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. The length and width of this part are both 0.375 units, and the height is 0.75 units.</description>
